name: Spacexel
description:
A very small project i did for school. It's a simple space shooter where you play as a cute robot against an horde of adorably evil slimes. 
Shoot the slimes to earn points! Get the highest score you can.
If an enemy touches you or manages to escape is game over.

Everything was made in Photoshop, Aseprite and Unity. 


CONTROLS:

WASD - Move the robot
J - Shoot
K (hold) - Charge and release the heavy shot
